name: Under A Caustic Snow, I Danced
name_original: Under A Caustic Snow, I Danced
description:
To a town by a crater lake, a traveller comes.

-

Made for the Bitsy Secret Santa 2019 for Tyedye105 on the given themes of "Mecha, Yokai, Travelling".

Thank you to Adam for making Bitsy, Max for making ImageToBitsy, and Sean for hacking it.
